ygData.subject: RE: Welcome to shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: I am new to this list, and hope it is pretty active. This is not my first character or Shadow Knight for that matter, but I lost touch because my lag issues
ygData.messageBody:
I am new to this list, and hope it is pretty active.

This is not my first character or Shadow Knight for that matter, but I lost
touch because my lag issues made my TSK not very fun to play. I am starting
over with a DE SK and have some questions.

What armor, not blackened, is better than Banded or Bronze for AC?
What 1HS weapon is best and what is in your off hand? I am looking into
getting a Barbed Whip in Najena, and a CGS from Sol.

What stats increasing items are best? Strength and Dex?

Thanks.

--
Lasombra Shadowfiend
1st Tier of Hate
